body.p: Virginia Tech, formally known as the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, is a top public research university in Blacksburg, Virginia.

section.title: Student Population
section.p: Virginia Tech serves over 34,000 students, including a large undergraduate population of about 29,000.

section.title: Popular Majors and Degrees
section.p: Engineering, Business, and Computer Science are among the most popular majors. The university is widely recognized for its engineering programs.

section.title: Location
section.p: Virginia Tech's main campus is located in Blacksburg, with additional research facilities around the state and globally.

section.title: Mascot
section.p: The mascot is the "HokieBird," representing the Virginia Tech Hokies, which is a unique symbol of school spirit.

section.title: Additional Information
section.p: Virginia Tech is a land-grant university with a strong emphasis on research, innovation, and practical learning.
